description: Try our easy to follow Indian Masala Fish & Potato Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Indian Masala Fish & Potato Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add lemon rind, snow peas, fish and any fish juices to curry. Gently stir to combine. Cover and cook on medium-low heat for 7 minutes. Sprinkle with fresh coriander. Serve with rice, yoghurt and naan.
